urls.description: The Vegas Golden Knights (19-8-1) will take on the Philadelphia Flyers (9-13-5) on Friday at 7 p.m. at T-Mobile Arena. ...

data.text:
🗓️ MARK YOUR CALENDARS 🗓️

We are hosting “Merry & Bright with the Golden Knights” at @Cosmopolitan_LV on December 18! Fans will have the opportunity to skate and take photos with Brayden McNabb, Zach Whitecloud, and Shea Theodore! Best of all, it’s FREE and open to the public. https://t.co/7qmFlBZlM4
Nothing like learning the game we all love 😃 https://t.co/3MMAejtSks

As an extension of Hispanic Heritage Knight, we hosted a ball hockey clinic at James Boys & Girls Club to bring the fun of the sport to kids from predominantly Hispanic neighborhoods! 🏒 

#VegasBorn | @Bridgestone https://t.co/wYohJsmHq5
We are here with Kolesar, Amadio, Roy and Thompson at @threesquareLV packing bags for families in need 🤗 https://t.co/PDhqAKfx3x
@miguelkicks @EASPORTSNHL congrats, you’ve won! Please let us know your Name, Gamertag and Console type 👍
@durowrx @EASPORTSNHL congrats, you’ve won! Please let us know your Name, Gamertag and Console type 👍
🎥 Cassidy: We're trying to build our game so we can maintain from night to night. https://t.co/eh7OLyXLHB

If your New Years resolution was to enjoy a Golden Knights game with a buffet and bottomless beers & mimosas on New Year’s Eve then do we have the package for YOU! Come celebrate Noon Year’s Eve with us on 12/31! 🥳
 
🎟: https://t.co/75KSFfJxYW https://t.co/7wYFG1LnMm
Right back to it 💪 https://t.co/3etOZTrnhP
RT @VGK_PR: The Golden Knights will practice Thursday at 11:30 am PT at @CityNatlArena
🎥 Bruce Cassidy after Wednesday's game against New York https://t.co/7WQhnA8UsT
🎥 Whitecloud on the third period: We play a certain way and we just have to manage pucks in the right spots. https://t.co/aIacC6nEf0
🎥 Marchessault on the third period: Just a lack of commitment to defending well... just a really bad period. https://t.co/zRaSslMLNl

let's forget this one happened 🫠

https://t.co/MlHvWkgBrE

Jonathan Marchessault scored his seventh overtime goal and tied Shea Theodore for the most in franchise history as the @GoldenKnights defeated the Flyers at T-Mobile Arena.

#NHLStats: https://t.co/mAxj5uWfJS https://t.co/AVMDtv72BV

The @GoldenKnights will hold morning skate Friday at 10:30 am PT at @CityNatlArena ahead of that night's game against the Flyers (7 pm PT at T-Mobile Arena).
